esg.saml.common
Class SAMLBuilder

java.lang.Object
  esg.saml.common.SAMLBuilder

public class SAMLBuilder
extends Object

Utility class to build, marshall, serialize and embed SAML objects. This class is a singleton to enforce sharing of factories and XML parsers.
